headline: Jim Cramer Wonders If He Gave Up On Danaher (DHR) “At The Bottom”
summary: We recently published 12 Stocks Jim Cramer Mentioned In An Episode Where He Briefly Commented On Data Centers. Danaher Corporation (NYSE:DHR) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Jim Cramer hasn’t held back when commenting on Danaher Corporation (NYSE:DHR) in 2025. Early in the year, he criticized the firm’s management for being “smug” […]
